      • MONSTERLAIR

        Constant Field Values

      • hand

        public Research[] hand
        Represents a few Research options that the player or #automanager can use to advance a town. Grow should always be the first option. A value of null means that the hand is initially empty, that it's card has been spent or that there are no more valid cards of that type. These are the card types by index for non-hostile (human) Towns: 0 - Grow 1 - Native (from #realm) Upgrade. 2 - Foreign Upgrade 3 - Native Item. 4 - Foreign Item 5 - Native Monster lair, see #lairs 6 - Special card 7 - Accommodations upgrade. 8 - Transport upgrade. These are the card types by index for hostile (monster) Towns: 0 - Grow 1 - Native Monster lair, see #lairs 2-7 - RecruitOption for it to recruit an unit into Location.garrison
        See Also:
        Research.draw(Town)

        public ResearchQueue queue
